website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and comfortable as either a backpack or a shoulder bag, although Phantom 4 owners may want to look elsewhere for a better fit.
pros: Use it as a backpack or a shoulder bag
Can hold one DJI Phantom quad, accessories, and a 15-inch laptop
Features protective cushioning and chest-waist straps for comfort
cons: Interior of the bag is not customizable
Some buyers claim that this bag will not fit a Phantom 4 quad

customer_reviews.title: good quality backpack
customer_reviews.text: I used this to carry my Phantom 3 on Delta flights from FL to CA and back with no issues. The backpack i received has 2 compartments instead of the one large compartment shown in some of the other reviews, but this was fine. The only reason i gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is that the depth of the backpack is about an inch less than would have been ideal for the legs on the phantom. They press pretty hard against the front of the backpack, so i was careful to never put pressure on that area. All in all though, a good backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel V. Wilder

customer_reviews.title: NO REGRETS
customer_reviews.text: I got this just for airline travel for the DJI P3P (1 personal bag is free)The measurements listed are 16.4 x 12.6 x 7.9 inches ,BUT Actual measurements are 18x12x10 which is 2" taller then allowed(12x14x16).BUT there was no problem on 4 planes.Carried 5 batteries,charger,15" laptop,ipad and plenty of other stuff. It needs a water bottle holder and its a bit of a PIA to load and unload (compared to the GPC (backpack)but Once again this was just for airline use I hiked 7-10 miles a day with it.
customer_reviews.author: planb

customer_reviews.title: Poor zipper quality and other materials
customer_reviews.text: Overall this bag looks great and design is nice to hold the Phantom 3 plus 4 batteries and other item but quality of zippers is very poor and it is a struggle to ope or close the bag. Also some of the letters on the logo were missing when I got the item indicating that this manufacturer has bad quality control. Save your money and invest in a better quality bag.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetman

customer_reviews.title: This is a great backpack and a good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack and a good value for the money. My biggest problem was figuring it out. I wish that some instructions or at least a diagram of how to open it and load the drone. I ordered a set of engine covers to keep from tearing it up. It came with an extra, pocket like piece that I had trouble figuring out. It is a tripod cup - clips to the front and supports the bottom of a tripod that you can strap to it. I would definitely recommend this to others but would recommend that an instruction diagram be included.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Jefferies

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this bag. It houses my drone, 2 batteries, remote (with attachments), charger, cables, propellers and still has plenty of room for a laptop and/or some additional accesories. It's comfortable on my back. It has plenty of clips that make the bag more 'secure'. Lot's of pockets and holes to store things.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hegener

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit for the drone, but well built.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very snug fit for the DJI Phantom 3, but it does fit. The zipper path is unusual and seems to make it more difficult to zip up the snug fitting drone. Plenty of pockets for everything and all are protected with soft felt or net mesh, zippered closed or use Velcro fasteners to hold things in place. The material and workmanship appear to be very good. It is comfortable to wear and there is room for more gear if you need it.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Not enough protection, but light and compact
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't give sufficient crush proof protection. Feels like something placed on top of the bag (when lying down) would crush the legs which would need to support all the weight. Removing and replacing the P4 is also slightly tedious. The fit is tight as the dividers are soft and fit is snug. You need to adjust while sliding the P4 in unlike a hard case/backpack where you can just drop the craft in. Positives are extremely light weight and much more space to put other things unlike the P3 hardshell backpack from DJi
customer_reviews.author: Experienced Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. I have a Phantom 4 so the batteries don't fit in the battery pouches as shown in the pictures - they must be Phantom 3 batteries - but there's still plenty of room in other parts of the bag for all the Phantom 4 parts. It's sturdy, well made and has lots of padding, pockets, pouches etc. Just took it on an international trip with my drone inside and everything was properly protected, it fit in the overhead, and also got my laptop in there along with the drone. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cahill

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOFTSHELL PACK !!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few different softshell backpacks for my Phantom 3 and this is for sure my favorite due to the fact that it holds the most for sure. The previous pack I had was ok but cost $88. This one was much better quality, more room, MANY more features and compartments. If you are looking for a great softshell pack for your Phantom 2 or 3 this is the pack for you. I am not paid to give this review, I am simply speaking from field use of this pack and many others like it. You will not be disappointed. It even comes with a rainfly pack cover
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Cumbersome Design
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews, but it was a little more confusing than what I read. Yes, there is a lot of room, but hard to get to. It's a very snug fit for my P4, but it does fit. What I don't like is that I have to turn the bag upside down to open the rest of the compartments. Maybe because it's new, but the zippers are hard to open. I would like to have a bag that is easy to open to get to my goods.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I could find locally
customer_reviews.text: Took on 3 flights with 3 different airlines ( spirit, United and Delta) - no problem as a ‘carry on’. Bag stays firm in spots to keep crush proof, do cap your drone of course too though. Better than what I could find locally
customer_reviews.author: Ocean561

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good bag.
customer_reviews.text: Well it’s my 2nd attempt at buy a drone bag for not only the drone but my cameras too. The bag itself is really nice but my Autel does not fit in it the DJI drones should fit.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift and he can’t stop telling me how perfect it is. A 54 year old man sounds like a kid because he loves it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's awesome to find an off brand version for about 60-70% ...
customer_reviews.text: I was originally looking at both the hardshell backpack and this version of the backpack for my DJI Phantom 3 Professional. This backpack is sold by DJI for about $330, it's awesome to find an off brand version for about 60-70% less. The backpack is amazing, fits the drone + 4 batteries, the charger and remote easily. Glad I went with this over the hard shell
customer_reviews.author: EatSleepAmzn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and interesting design the way it zips up ...
customer_reviews.text: The backpack fits my Phantom 3 Standard very well and there is plenty room for the controller, iPad, extra battery packs, etc. There are pockets to keep everything organized. Good quality and interesting design the way it zips up around the drone. Quick shipping - even without Prime, I received the backpack three days after ordering it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hermans

customer_reviews.title: DJI Phantom or EHANG Ghostdrone 2.0 VR case/backpack.
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this DJI Phantom backpack for my EHANG Ghostdrone 2.0 VR which is a little taller than the Phantom. it's tight but it fits just fine and a good quality backpack with plenty of storage space and well thought out design.
customer_reviews.author: SaltyCracker

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: At first it was confusing cuz it has a lot of zippers but just took a minute to figure it out. Its in perfect condition and will protect your phantom i highly recommend this to anyone looking for just one bag that can carry more then just a drone

customer_reviews.title: OK but not my preference.
customer_reviews.text: Does not cover a Phantom4 as nicely as I would have liked. It's a soft case so it's easy to break the drone if the backpack is every squished. I returned it as it wasn't an ideal mix of protection, portability & easy of use for me. I'm sure it will be for others though.
customer_reviews.author: Ryeguy

customer_reviews.title: This backpack would be better if the compartment for the drone was at the ...
customer_reviews.text: The odd zig-zag zipper track on the bottom half (where the Blue outline is) is difficult to open. The drone fits very snug, but I'm worried that a slight impact while putting the bag down could damage it, two of the propeller corners are the at the bottom of the back. This backpack would be better if the compartment for the drone was at the top of the bag, not the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Juan M

customer_reviews.title: It fits the DJI Phantom 3 Standard with props removed just fine. Battery
customer_reviews.text: Very reasonably priced back pack for a drone. It fits the DJI Phantom 3 Standard with props removed just fine. Battery, controller, remote, and charger all fit as well. I like that it can be worn as a backpack, or you can tuck the shoulder straps in and it can be used as a sling bag. Also, it just looks like a pack and not like there is a drone in there.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Price

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack.
customer_reviews.text: A little snug but it fitx my Phantom 3 professional and all the accessories. Be aware that you'll need to remove everything from your phantom 3 to get it to fit in this backpack. Propellars, guards etc all need to come off.
customer_reviews.author: Luxbrands

customer_reviews.title: Solid backpack
customer_reviews.text: I've been a long time DJI user and love this backpack. At first I thought it didn't fit but then realized that I put the P3 in upside down. Fits great! Well made backpack- and really lightweight. Lots of storage in a small package. I paid full price for this backpack and would be willing to pay more!
customer_reviews.author: KMan

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, zippers and clips a little tricky to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, zippers and clips a little tricky to figure out. Comfortable, light weight, and holds everything you could possibly need plus. Would recommend getting this bag for anyone who has any of the DJI Phantoms.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B

customer_reviews.title: Great Great Great  BackPack
customer_reviews.text: Great great great BackPack, all of the space you need to hold your phantom 3 advanced and accesories, It holds 2 batteries (I don't leave the battery inside my quad), and the weight is just perfect. 100 reccommended,
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Burneo

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good, sturdy backpack for drone. Phantom 3 drone is a little bit of a tight fit and not easily removable in the field unless you lay the pack down in the dirt. The backpack has an excessive amount of zippers and clips, not all of which seem to provide much function. But for the style and the price, this is a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag for phantom 4 pro / laptop / dslr
customer_reviews.text: Great bag , and yes it fits phantom 4 pro with control , plus on the top compartment it can fit a canon 80D (18-135mm) plus a sigma art 18-35mm , plus any chargers and accessories
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what i need it for -- all is good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag just a bit snug
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. Fits everything as advertised. The only complaint is that the propellers are a bit snug toward the top zippers and may cause them to stick out. Another issue is the Velcro at the bottom of the bag. This causes my propeller to stick to them. Not a big issue but just something to note. Otherwise its a great backpack for a great price. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: chrisian

customer_reviews.title: poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: Bag is ok however it is awkward to use as the compartments were not designed in a manner to make it easy to use. Zippers seem to be cheap and not easy to slide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I travel for a living and love to bring this along with me
customer_reviews.text: Fits my DJI Phantom 3, extra batteries and extra accessories perfectly.. with room to spare. I travel for a living and love to bring this along with me. Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Will definitely fit everything for my Phantom 3. The only negative would be the zippers.....they seem somewhat light duty. Time will tell whether they last or not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great traveling case
customer_reviews.text: Well made. All components fit with room to spare. Great traveling case.
customer_reviews.author: Greg L.

customer_reviews.title: Would have loved to know it was difficult to get the drone ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Would have loved to know it was difficult to get the drone in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Jay Uscola

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my hubby and he LOVES it! All the right storage for his quad and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: M. P.

customer_reviews.title: Huge backpack
customer_reviews.text: Amazing backpack with so much room. This will easily fit my drone and extra parts. This will fit my laptop and camera as well. So much extra room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BAG
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bag for the price. It holds my dji phantom 3 plus laptop, charges, controller plus a lot more. Lots of storage. The only negative I can see so far is the zippers seem to stick a lot other than that it's a great well made bag.
customer_reviews.author: alec dorton

customer_reviews.title: Go figure
customer_reviews.text: It took some time figuring out what zipper opened what pockets. I had a hard time fitting my drone in the bag. Didn't want to break the zipper. Would have been nice if it came with a diagram of what pockets were made for what devices.
customer_reviews.author: rtj1140

customer_reviews.title: Best bag
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack for the price. I can fit my 1dx, phantom 4 pro+ and 3 lenses in this bag
customer_reviews.author: tammy bruno

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pleanty of space. I have DJI Phantom Standard. I wish there was a designated area to keep the props.
customer_reviews.author: Kumar

customer_reviews.title: The way the set up is
customer_reviews.text: The way it is set up It could be Organized better. It does fit everything I should not need to any anything further
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Groff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build quality
customer_reviews.text: The build quality is excellent. I found that I could easily fit the Phantom 3 controller in the large bottom compartment where the quad-copter is strapped, leaving the upper compartment free for my large DSLR and telephoto lens. In addition to the quad-copter, controller, and extra props, I carry 4 spare batteries and both an iPhone and iPad. I haven’t personally handled the more expensive DJI pack that appears identical to this one, but I bet they are both made by the same company. Just use the magnifier in Amazon to compare the two items to see what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: Cyprinodon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our phantom 3
customer_reviews.text: Brother absolutely loved it for his bday present. Tons of storage!!! Adjustable pockets & lots of them to stay organized
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phantom 4 Protective Back pack.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Better than expected and at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: D J M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great drone backpack. Plenty of space and very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Pichot

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag. Tons of storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. Tons of storage, lots of pockets for small items and can hold two laptops, 6 batteries, controller, charger, ipad and much more.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great performing product
customer_reviews.text: Product is great and really practical. Prompt professional service from SSE.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Linn

customer_reviews.title: Same bag but cheaper 😜
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag for way cheaper than DJI's own 😉 Same bag, but cheaper. Hehe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room and great protection for the drone. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kristen Prince

customer_reviews.title: Great pack.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a dji phantom 3 standard recently and was looking for something to store it in for travel. This backpack is great. Lots of room for everything and extras. Very happy with this pack
customer_reviews.author: Seth M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and glad I purchased. Lots of storage capabilities and very comfortable to carry. I would buy again when I get my next drone as a backup
customer_reviews.author: texasfan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag lots of padding, fits my Phantom 4 drone plus two additional batteries quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Brock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For a smallish type backpack, you really can pack a lot along with the drone in it!!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: These are just like the OEM backpacks
customer_reviews.text: These are just like the OEM backpacks. Seem very durable and holds the drone and accessories perfectly. A very good value at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D Schidler

customer_reviews.title: To the point... Much smaller than expected ...
customer_reviews.text: To the point... Much smaller than expected, I had a very difficult time getting all the stuff inside and constantly concerned not to break stuff, too tight a fit for the P3P for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The drone is VERY difficult to fit into the designated ...
customer_reviews.text: The drone is VERY difficult to fit into the designated compartment. Otherwise its okay - but not a fan of how hard it is to get the drone into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bag looks identical to Dji's original version and it is definitely more than you could ask for within its bargained deal.
customer_reviews.author: Christian ROJAS

customer_reviews.title: Definitely wasn't the best backpack choice for a drone worth $1000+
customer_reviews.text: Definitely wasn't the best backpack choice for a drone worth $1000+. Backpack is very spacious and was able to fit everything all I needed when I was exploring this backpack. Design was not too bad and the raincover gives the backpack a nice touch for rainy days. My only concern was the lack of cushion. If you put your drone into this backpack and accidentally throw the backpack down quickly, there is a very high chance of the drone/accessories being damaged. The reason I give this backpack a 3 stars is because I know that this backpack will be able to cover the basic needs of transporting the drone without carrying everything.
customer_reviews.author: EV Accessories

customer_reviews.title: i think it was built for a Phantom 3 and ...
customer_reviews.text: i think it was built for a Phantom 3 and just SORTA fits the Phantom 4... non of the pockets for the Phantom 4 batteries fit.
customer_reviews.author: Slice Editorial

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Hattori

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Backpack, I have a couple of drones and ...
customer_reviews.text: The Perfect Backpack , I have a couple of drones and I Love this pack!

product_meta.title: SSE Backpack for DJI Quadcopter Drones, Phantom 4 PRO V2.0, Phantom 4 PRO+ V2.0, Phantom 4 PRO, Phantom 4 PRO+, Phantom 4, Phantom 3, Phantom 3, Phantom 2, Phantom Fits Extra Accessories
product_meta.description: With room for a DJI Phantom series Quadcopter and accessories, the SSE Backpack provides a convenient way to safely transport your investment, whether trekking or just going for a walk in the park. It will accommodate any Phantom model - original Phantom 1, Phantom 2, Phantom 2 Vision/Vision+, or Phantom 3, along with spare props, up to five batteries , a laptop up to 15", and more. The case is water-resistant, features protective cushioning, and includes a rain cover.
feature_bullets: Can be carried as either a shoulder bag or backpack, and has six outside pockets for convenience.
Drone backpack carrier is designed to protect against mild external shock and is constructed from tear-resistant and water-resistant fabric.

The SSE Backpack Accommodates One DJI Phantom series quadcopter (any model), One Phantom remote controller (transmitter) and range extender, Three to five DJI Phantom Smart Batteries, One Smart Battery Charger, Four pairs of propellers, and One 15-inch laptop and related accessories/cables.
Includes convenient water bottle holder pocket.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars141 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
